title: BC，如何让玩家在大厅用菜单看到子服有多少玩家
author: SakuraTao
txt_content: 如题，用的是CC菜单，bc核心是最新的，大厅是paper1.14.4核心

replies.txt_content: TrMenu 菜单应该是可以做到CC不行的 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: cc 菜单做不到，你得换一个能用 papi 变量的菜单插件

replies.author: 小天铄
replies.txt_content: https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-917827-1-1.html 可以使用dm菜单，有详细教程，变量在papi

replies.author: Radotar
